I've been investigating for 33 years...The day I got that "BOX" really chan=
ged 
things...I don't take everything I hear as spirit,if=A0 I catch it on =
EVP and it's 
clear I'll take it under my wing for some sort of response,BU=
T on the other hand 
We're getting our names called and asnwers to "Do You =
Know Where You Are ?" An d 
the response made us stop and wonder...reponse =
was "In the basement"......HELLO 
we're in the Basement......Also I believe=
 it will bring out the EVIL 
SIDE...which we did..and both my house as well=
 as our partners seems to have 
someone that has followed us,turning on lig=
hts in the kitchen and opening the 
kitchen cabinets up,It made me feel sic=
k all day and affected our cat...not to 
mention simular things at our part=
ners home...Be careful what you say and ask 
for...cause you might get more=
 than you want.....Love Ya Frank....Rick
